result.execSummary:
The defendant Zachary T. Pomar was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
AODA

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zachary T. Pomar

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Defendant Zachary T. Pomar in court with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Zachary T. Pomar in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 13CF199, 14CF123 and 15CF6 @ 2:05 p.m. Statement of negotiated plea filed and reviewed by the Court. Counsel and Def agree with agreement as stated. 14CF123 ct 2 felony bail jumping - guilty plea. Court reviews plea quest. and constitutional rights. Court reviews felony conviction restrictions and surcharges. Atty Schuster satisfied. Court accepts plea. Factual basis. Court finds Def guilty of ct 2 felony bail jumping. Def advised of firearms rights. 13CF199 - no corrections to revocation summary. ct 2 - 6 months jail with huber, 85 days credit. Civil judgment for court costs. Ct 3 - 60 days jail w/ huber w/ 85 days credit. Concurrent. Civil judgment for costs.  Ct 1 - DEJ revoked. Def has nothing to say. Court accepts agreement. Withheld sentence, 2 yrs probation, joint and several restitution $546.00, court costs.   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. 14CF123 ct 2 -  sentence withheld, 2 yrs probation, AODA, court costs. Postconviction rights. 15CF6 - dismissed and read in.  14CF123 ct 1 dismissed and read in.

Defendant Zachary T. Pomar not in court.  Jill Louise Laufenberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 14CF123, 13CF199 and 15CF6.  Statement by Atty Laufenberg.  Atty Laufenberg has had contact with def's father.  Working on obtaining counsel.  Def is in jail in Brown County  Initial appearance scheduled for February 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Wright C. Laufenberg in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 14CF123, 13CF199 and 15CF6 @ 9:20 a.m. Atty Laufenberg is not retained or appointed to 15CF6 at this time. State has been advised Def is on probation hold in another county. State asks to adjourn 15CF6 for initial appearance at next date set on other cases.  Status conference scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 11:15 am.

Defendant Zachary T. Pomar in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 14CF1023& 13CF199 @ 9:12 am.  14CF123 - Waiver of Preliminary Examination Filed.  Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing.  Court accepts waiver and finds probable cause.  Information Filed. Atty Laufenberg has copy of information, waives reading,  & enters Not Guilty plea to both ct's. Def. must keep address current - Def's current address is: 908 14th Ave, Green Bay. Atty Laufenberg will get set at a later date.  Court enters Not Guilty plea on both ct's. 13CF199 will be set at later date.

Defendant Zachary T. Pomar in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 14CF123 and 13CF199 @ 11:42 a.m. Statement by Atty Laufenberg. Asks for prelim on 14CF123. 13CF199 to follow. Bond remains.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 23, 2014 at 09:00 am.
